评论概述: Some is smaller than it appears
评论详情: I think the necklaces are cute one problem is after prolonged wear if you have sister to skin it could cause an irritation or rash! I developed a rash after a little bit! I did put clear nail polish on it so won't tarnish that quick! The angel is smaller than I thought it would be but other than that for the value of the money is okay! The quality is okay just be careful for people with sensitive skin! I wish that it could have been stainless steel!

评论概述: Great for looks not so great for quality!
评论详情: I love every single one of these necklaces, my only complaint is that the quality is very poor but if you only care about looks and not durability while being on a tight budget then this will definitely work for you! I like to wear edgy clothing on the daily so these work well to achieve that style. I can also see these working out for Halloween costumes too so that's an added bonus.

评论概述: you get what you pay for
评论详情: these are by no means amazing quality, but for the price you get them for, they’re really good, and the angel/heart choker necklace is genuinely really good quality, plus you get 1 extra chain that’s also really good quality, i recommend putting clear nail polish on them just to prevent rust/decaying. overall 5/5
